Then <S%G3767><s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G2214>question<s%> between some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2491>John's<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3326>and<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2512>purifying.<s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> it <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> bear me <S%G3140>witness,<s%> <S%G3427><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G1565>him.<s%>

He <S%G1565><s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G837>increase,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1691>I<s%> must <S%G1642>decrease.<s%>

He that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all:<s%> he that <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>earthly,<s%> <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth:<s%> he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>

He that hath <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> hath set to his <S%G4972>seal<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true.<s%>
